analysis.key_quote: This rule will discourage skilled and competent applicants from applying to Federal positions which are essentially "at will" positions and where they can be terminated at the arbitrary discretion of a manager or supervisor who themselves are incompetent, but have political standing to hold their position.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concerns about the politicization of federal employment and the potential loss of merit-based hiring practices, indicating opposition to the proposed rule.
